title: Bacolod
summary: Bacolod, officially the City of Bacolod (/bɑːˈkɔːləd/; Hiligaynon: Dakbanwa/Syudad sang Bacolod; Tagalog: Lungsod ng Bacolod), is a 1st class highly urbanized city in the region of Western Visayas, Philippines.[8] It is the capital of the province of Negros Occidental, where it is geographically situated but governed administratively independent.
